      Group by records on the basis of supplied groupBy field and Aggregate records using Record.combine(Record)
      (package private) List<Record> ClientModeStrategy.aggregateRecordsAndAddDistinct(List<Record> records, Field groupBy, Field distinctField, Field uniqueCountAssignedTo)
      Aggregate the records and count the unique values for the given distinctField
      (package private) List<Record> RegionModeStrategy.selectModeFieldsAndAddCountField(List<FieldInfo> fieldInfos, List<Record> records, Field countField)
      Form new record list with records formed by only fields provided through fieldInfo and add a count field for each record with value 1 We are doing two operation of selecting and adding new field because of saving some CPU cycles on rebuilding the record again
